verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David בַּֽיהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> In the LORD חָסִ֗יתִי <WH2620> put I my trust אֵ֭יךְ <WH349> How תֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> how say לְנַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> ye to my soul [נוּדוּ כ] (נ֝֗וּדִי <WH5110> bemoan ק) הַרְכֶ֥ם <WH2022> to your mountain צִפּֽוֹר׃ <WH6833> [as] a bird

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֪ה <WH2009> behold הָרְשָׁעִ֡ים <WH7563> For lo the wicked יִדְרְכ֬וּן <WH1869> bend קֶ֗שֶׁת <WH7198> [their] bow כּוֹנְנ֣וּ <WH3559> they make ready חִצָּ֣ם <WH2671> their arrow עַל־ <WH5921> upon יֶ֑תֶר <WH3499> upon the string לִיר֥וֹת <WH3384> shoot בְּמוֹ־ <WH1119> for אֹ֝֗פֶל <WH652> darkness לְיִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> at the upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> in heart
כִּ֣י <WH3588> If הַ֭שָּׁתוֹת <WH8356> If the foundations יֵֽהָרֵס֑וּן <WH2040> be destroyed צַ֝דִּ֗יק <WH6662> what can the righteous מַה־ <WH4100> What פָּעָֽל׃ <WH6466> do

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD בְּֽהֵ֘יכַ֤ל <WH1964> temple קָדְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6944> [is] in his holy יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> the LORD'S בַּשָּׁמַ֪יִם <WH8064> [is] in heaven כִּ֫סְא֥וֹ <WH3678> throne עֵינָ֥יו <WH5869> his eyes יֶחֱז֑וּ <WH2372> behold עַפְעַפָּ֥יו <WH6079> his eyelids יִ֝בְחֲנ֗וּ <WH974> try בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> The LORD צַדִּ֪יק <WH6662> the righteous יִ֫בְחָ֥ן <WH974> trieth וְ֭רָשָׁע <WH7563> but the wicked וְאֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> and him that loveth חָמָ֑ס <WH2555> violence שָֽׂנְאָ֥ה <WH8130> hateth נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> his soul

יַמְטֵ֥ר <WH4305> he shall rain עַל־ <WH5921> upon רְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> Upon the wicked פַּ֫חִ֥ים <WH6341> snares אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire וְ֭גָפְרִית <WH1614> and brimstone וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> tempest זִלְעָפ֗וֹת <WH2152> and an horrible מְנָ֣ת <WH4521> [this shall be] the portion כּוֹסָֽם׃ <WH3563> of their cup

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> For the righteous יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> LORD צְדָק֣וֹת <WH6666> righteousness אָהֵ֑ב <WH157> loveth יָ֝שָׁ֗ר <WH3477> the upright יֶחֱז֥וּ <WH2372> doth behold פָנֵֽימוֹ׃ <WH6440> his countenance
